snippet: Several people were arrested over bombing attacks planned for June 16, and explosives were seized, the Intelligence Ministry said.
lead_paragraph: Several people were arrested over bombing attacks planned for June 16, and explosives were seized, the Intelligence Ministry said.

headline.main: Iran Says It Foiled One of the ‘Biggest Terrorism Plots Ever’
